ygData.subject: Re: Another suggestion
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, another DOT would be best in my opinion. Something to stack with the darkness line. Morgul ... From: Wilson, ThomasX B  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, another DOT would be best in my opinion. Something to stack with the
darkness line.

Morgul
----- Original Message -----
From: Wilson, ThomasX B <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, September 17, 1999 3:25 PM
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Another suggestion


> From: "Wilson, ThomasX B" <thomasx.b.wilson@...>
>
>
> Thought of one issue with a Harm Shield type spell (for me at least), I
> commonly group with either a Mage or a Druid (I will be in a group with
one
> of these at least 90% of the time). And honestly their Harm Shields work a
> hell of a lot better than anything we will be given. I would rather see a
> ATK increasing spell (like Grim Aura, etc) or another type of DOT (Poison
> Bolt perhaps).
>
> Anyway, just something I thought of.
>
> Thom
